caption: Elara leans forward, her breath visible in the frosty lecture hall air as she writes equations on the fogged glass board. Her micro pencil skirt clings to hips accentuated by the warm winter light filtering through snow-dusted windows ✨, while her unbuttoned blouse hints at the curves beneath. A teasing glance at the class sends a ripple of warmth through the room ❄️ #UniversityGlam #SexyTeacher #WinterVibes
